details:
adjective
- expressing careful judgment
= example: expressing careful judgment
= synonyms: discriminative
- decreed by or proceeding from a court of justice
= example: decreed by or proceeding from a court of justice
- relating to the administration of justice or the function of a judge
= example: relating to the administration of justice or the function of a judge
= synonyms: juridical
- belonging or appropriate to the office of a judge
= example: belonging or appropriate to the office of a judge
